* She'd been walking for days and she hadn't run into a single source of 
water yet, her armor already dry and beginning to crack a little.
She was a sea monster, not a land plodder.
Sublime looked up at the surrounding trees, looking beyond their tops and at 
the clear sky...not a rain cloud in sight.
Sighing, she kept on going.
The Maximal base was still a fair ways off and it would take her a few more 
days to get there.
Her destress beakon still active.*

...................................

* Iris looked over at the crowd of Maximals, watching and waiting.*

...................................

* Diana waited for her friend, Rion, to either climb onto her back or walk 
with her towards all thoses trees in the distance. But then she felt a 
rumble under her feet, lifting a brow and looking at Rion.*

� This isn�t a place where earthquakes happen, is it?�

* While she waited for this answer the ground continued to move, making her 
ears press back against her head and her eyes darted around. But she almost 
jumped out of her fur when she saw what was making the ground shake.
Pushing her paw against Rion�s cheek she tried to make him look towards a 
large dinosaur that looked hungry and was coming their way.*

� RION!�
